snippet: LEAD: In an intensified effort by Federal prosecutors to take on criminal cases involving campaign finance, a California businessman has been convicted of exceeding the limit on individual donations to help Senator Alan Cranston win re-election in...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: In an intensified effort by Federal prosecutors to take on criminal cases involving campaign finance, a California businessman has been convicted of exceeding the limit on individual donations to help Senator Alan Cranston win re-election in 1986.

headline.main: Cranston Backer Guilty in Campaign Finance Case

byline.original: By RICHARD L. BERKE, Special to The New York Times
